collinear In The Wild

Source: vignettes/articles/collinear_in_the_wild.Rmd
collinear_in_the_wild.Rmd

Summary

This article lists mentions and citations to the R package collinear.

2025

Zhang, F., Hu, B., Meng, L., Pang, M., Chen, Y., Song, W., Feng, Y., & Ma, Y. (2025). Appropriate biochar application methods can simultaneously mitigate Cd concentrations in different parts of soil and crops: A meta-analysis. Soil Use and Management, 41, e70044. https://doi.org/10.1111/sum.70044

2024

Simons, A. L., Baez, H., Acharya-Patel, N., Helbing, C. C., Jeffers, J., Stanford, J., & Meyer, R. S. (2024). TerraDactyl: A tool for connecting environmental data to when and where. Ecological Informatics, 102974. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ecoinf.2024.102974
